_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Cloudnet
author: admin@kleckzz.de
description:
CloudNet is the next generation of Minecraft Java and Bedrock cloud systems.
You can use it for a productive network.

installation.script:
#!/bin/ash
# Cloudnet Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server

cd /mnt/server

# Fetch download link
DOWNLOAD_LINK="https://github.com/CloudNetService/CloudNet-v3/releases/download/${CLOUDNET_VERSION}/CloudNet.zip"

if curl --output /dev/null --silent --head --fail "echo https://github.com/CloudNetService/CloudNet-v3/releases/${CLOUDNET_VERSION}/download/CloudNet.zip"; then
    DOWNLOAD_LINK="https://github.com/CloudNetService/CloudNet-v3/releases/${CLOUDNET_VERSION}/download/CloudNet.zip"
fi

echo -e "Running curl -sSL ${DOWNLOAD_LINK} -o CloudNet.zip"

# donwload
curl -sSL "${DOWNLOAD_LINK}" -o CloudNet.zip
#unzip
unzip -o CloudNet.zip

# cleanup
rm -rf CloudNet.zip

echo "install complete"
